name: Explosm.net black/orange [2015 update]
description:
After the restyle of explosm, I was almost blinded by that color.. urgh!
So I made it black, and changed the buttons.

user.name: Bubi
user.about: I dislike Flash, because it hammers a page's style with unflexibility.

additional_info:
So, yeah... First Version. Couldn't bear that original color, so I made it black.
The buttons are from some media control thingy (will be changed sometime)
